meanings.definition: A drug used to lower cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed clofibrate to help reduce my cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Many people take clofibrate to manage their cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook clofibrate for candy, thinking it would taste sweet.
meanings.sent4: Clofibrate is like a shield that protects your heart by fighting high cholesterol.
meanings.sent5: The tiny clofibrate pill works hard to keep your cholesterol in check.

meanings.definition: To treat high cholesterol levels with the drug clofibrate.
meanings.sent1: Patients clofibrate regularly to control their cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend clofibrate to patients with high cholesterol.
meanings.sent3: I clofibrate my cholesterol levels like a superhero fighting off villains.
meanings.sent4: Clofibrating your cholesterol is like giving it a stern talking-to.
meanings.sent5: Remember to clofibrate responsibly to maintain a healthy heart.
